name: Tower Shield
description: A large shield that provides excellent protection at the cost of mobility.
tooltip: Your gain 25% block chance while wearing this armor.
Your DEX bonus is decreased by 2 while wearing this armor.
You take 30% less bludgeoning damage while wearing this armor.
You take 15% less piercing damage while wearing this armor.
You take 40% less slashing damage while wearing this armor.
